properties.areaDesc: Marion, TN; Sequatchie, TN; Bledsoe, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 3:03PM EST until January 5 at 5:48AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe...Marion and
Sequatchie Counties

Over two inches of rain are expected to fall across the Sequatchie
basin through Friday morning, and will result in sharp rises on the
river.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN.
* From Friday afternoon until late Saturday night.
* At 01:15 PM Thursday the stage was 6.0 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 15.0 feet by early Saturday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by Sunday morning.
* At 16.0 feet...Flooding of agricultural land becomes more
extensive. Water reaches the bottom of the river gage house.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
